description:
Using the key completed by Teruto, Sakura challenges the King. The reason why she wanted to challenge Kikka was to make her wish come true, which was to regain her own body. Since she was unable to take part in Rebuild Battles on her own, she tricked Teruto into fighting in the battles to complete the key for her, so she could appear before the King. A siren signaling the start of the King battle echoes throughout Neo Kyoto. Sakura and Kikka both call their Aces and face each other. Sakura’s fight to make her wish come true begins…
Source: crunchyroll
